extends java.lang.Object
    Class for Inventories of GameObjects.
    Version:
    1.00, 2013-04-18 ok I'm timed of Inventories so I'm gonna go look at networking. 04/11/13
    Author:
    Stephen Butler

      • addItem

        public boolean addItem(GameObject item)
        Add an item to the inventory. Check if the inventory is full before adding. If it is full, return false.
        Parameters:
        item - The GameObject to add to the inventory
        Returns:
        success Whether or not the add was successful.
